mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.pid AS "pid", a.cj_date AS "cjDate", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.station_addr AS "stationAddr", a.stay_times AS "stayTimes", a.create_date AS "createDate"

a.id AS "id", a.pid AS "pid", a.cj_date AS "cjDate", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.station_addr AS "stationAddr", a.stay_times AS "stayTimes", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_tsequen( id, pid, cj_date, of_shizhou, of_quxian, station_addr, stay_times, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pid}, #{cjDate}, #{ofShizhou}, #{ofQuxian}, #{stationAddr}, #{stayTimes}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE p_tsequen SET pid = #{pid}, cj_date = #{cjDate}, of_shizhou = #{ofShizhou}, of_quxian = #{ofQuxian}, station_addr = #{stationAddr}, stay_times = #{stayTimes} WHERE id = #{id}
